Klasse BookingController

java.lang.Object
at.technikum.drivingschool.bookingappbackend.controller.BookingController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*", maxAge=3600L) @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/booking") public class BookingController extends Object

    get all bookings for specific user only admin should have access
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>
    getAllMyBookings()
    get all bookings of logged in student only student can access this method throws internal server error in case logged in user not found (could be security violation)
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>
    removeMyBooking(Long bookingId)
    student cancels their own booking verifies if the booking belongs to this specific student, if not, not allowed to remove

  • Methodendetails

    • getAllBookings

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllBookings()
      get all bookings in the system only admin should have access
      Gibt zurück:
      list of bookings

    • getAllForUser

      @GetMapping("/allForUser/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllForUser(@PathVariable("userId") Long userId)
      get all bookings for specific user only admin should have access
      Parameter:
      userId -
      Gibt zurück:
      list of bookings of the user or empty

    • getAllMyBookings

      @GetMapping("/myBookings") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllMyBookings()
      get all bookings of logged in student only student can access this method throws internal server error in case logged in user not found (could be security violation)
      Gibt zurück:
      list of bookings of the logged in user or empty

    • bookEvent

      @PutMapping("/bookEvent") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> bookEvent(@RequestParam("event") Event event)
      saves the booking for a specific event for logged in user
      Parameter:
      event -
      Gibt zurück:

    • removeMyBooking

      @DeleteMapping("/removeMyBooking") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeMyBooking(@RequestParam("bookingId") Long bookingId)
      student cancels their own booking verifies if the booking belongs to this specific student, if not, not allowed to remove

      bookingId -
